law.text: The commission shall promulgate appropriate and reasonable regulations for the purpose of carrying out the provisions of this chapter.
law.history: Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 357, sec. 11, effective July 13, 1984. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 374, sec. 12, effective July 15, 1982. -- Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 175, sec. 18.
